Face Painting Plus Perth

Welcome to Face Painting Plus Perth, over the last 6 years we have traveled from Mandurah to Two Rocks putting smiles on kids faces everywhere. We cater from small family events to large commercial and fund-raising events thrown in also.

  • Face Painting
  • Balloon Twisting
  • Bubble-ology (big bubbles)
  • Spray and Glitter Tattoos

All of our artists come with Working With Children cards and Public Liability Insurance which are available on request.

Current Special

2 hour combo for upto 18 children (can re-quote for larger numbers)
2 for $150 or 3 for $180

Additional Services

Bubble kits

Each kit includes:

  • 4ltrs of bubble solution
  • 2x Bubble wands
  • Bucket with lid
  • Wand repair kit
  • Special kit bag
  • Discount voucher
